sentences.english: By 12th grade, they graduated from high school.
sentences.chinese: 到了12年级，他们从高中毕业了。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读青衣分校人力资源管理学高级文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: These exist cross-action between specialty and grade. (4) There exist the apparent characteristic on development.
sentences.chinese: 并且学科和年级间存在显著的交互作用。

sentences.english: This is a senior-year course in English.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个三年级英语课程。

sentences.english: The third-graders are having a traffic education lesson.
sentences.chinese: 原来是三年级的学生正在上交通安全教育课。

sentences.english: Content Analysis Study on Character Education in Textbooks of Learning Area of Integrated …
sentences.chinese: 台湾国民小学中年级综合活动领域教科书融入品德。

sentences.english: A first-grader came to the ophthalmology office where I work to have his vision checked.
sentences.chinese: 一个一年级学生来到我办公的眼科室检查视力。

sentences.english: They said we can only offer paid positions to rising seniors.
sentences.chinese: 公司说只能提供有薪实习项目给高年级同学。

sentences.english: Goh Teck Sien is our first year missiological student in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 吴哲仙是卫理神学院2009年宣教科一年级学生。

sentences.english: As a student in Grade 9 we have to memorize a huge amounts of imformation.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个9年级的学生，我们必须记住大量的信息。

sentences.english: Enlightenment education in grade seven is very important.
sentences.chinese: 七年级的启蒙教育非常重要。

sentences.english: I'm studying at Qihang bilingual school, in Class 2, Grade 4.
sentences.chinese: 我住在仙河镇，我在启航双语学校四年级二班上学。

sentences.english: But the children were the same as the second-graders he'd left behind in Philadelphia.
sentences.chinese: 但是孩子们和他离开的费城二年级的孩子们一样。

sentences.english: I am the 3rd year student of Southeast University.
sentences.chinese: 是一名东南大学三年级学生。

sentences.english: I have watched Conan since like 10th grade.
sentences.chinese: 好像自从10年级开始我就在看柯南的表演了。

sentences.english: However, 63% of patients had less than 9th-grade numeracy skills.
sentences.chinese: 然而63%的病人计算能力低于9年级水平。

definition: junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to pass brilliantly (used in congratulatory fashion)
senior high school/abbr. for 高級中學|高级中学[gao1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to divide people into groups, teams, squads etc
third year in junior middle school
teacher in charge of a class
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
